item.title: Signal in LTE networks
item.description: Basic definitions RSSI - received signal strength indicator SINR - signal to interference plus noise ratio \[ \mathsf{SINR(x)=\frac{P}{I+N}} \] Signal quality RSSI SINR (dB) RSRQ (dB) RSRP (dB) EC/Io (dB) Excellent > -65 > 12.5 > -5 > -84 > -2 Good -65 — -75 10 — 12.5 -6 — -10 -65 — -102 -2 — -5 Fair -75 — -85 7 — 10 -6 — -10 -103 — -111 -5 — -10 Poor < -85 7 -11 < -112 < -10 1 Table source
